EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for downloading DZone’s Guide to Modern Java spotlight
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for downloading DZone’s Guide to Modern Java spotlight research. We hope you find it informative and helpful as you explore technology options for your digital transformation journey.
Given your interest in this report, we thought you might also find these resources of use:
- eBook: Cloud-Native Java: Designing Resilient Systems with Spring Boot, Spring Cloud, and Cloud Foundry <[[https://content.pivotal.io/ebooks/cloud-native-java-ebook]]> - Video: Help Developers Do What They Love <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xdw_9dADM-4]]> - Podcast: Injecting Cloud Native Thinking Into Java With Spring Boot <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/features/injecting-cloud-native-thinking-into-java-with-spring-boot]]> - White Paper: Supercharging Your Microservices With NetflixOSS and Spring Cloud <[[https://pivotal.io/supercharging-your-microservices-with-netflixoss-and-spring-cloud]]> - Blog: Spring Cloud Stream: The New Event-driven Microservice Framework <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/products/spring-cloud-stream-the-new-event-driven-microservice-framework]]> - Slides: Cloud Native Java with Spring Cloud Services <[[http://www.slideshare.net/Pivotal/cloud-native-java-with-spring-cloud-services-64888067]]> - Blog: 5 Confessions Of A Platform Builder <[[https://blog.pivotal.io/pivotal-cloud-foundry/case-studies/5-confessions-of-a-platform-builder]]>
If you would like more information, or have any questions about how Pivotal can assist your organization on its digital transformation journey, don’t hesitate to reach out by contacting us here <[[https://pivotal.io/contact]]>.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team For in depth presentations on cloud-native topics and everything else to do with delivering software, please join us at SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email-confirmation&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=asset-download-confirmation]]>, taking place December 4-7, 2017 in San Francisco.
